column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We did get to eat the pizza later at about 11:30PM.  However
column2: I am astonished at how terrible it was prepared.  The pizza was prepared with large chunks of tomato
column3: hundreds of them.  I hate large chunks of tomato and only like tomato sauce.  The description on the menu says tomato sauce.  Some of the pizzas use sliced tomato; however
column4: ours was described as sauce and not chunks of tomato.
